publication.title: Choose the Damping, Choose the Ranking?
publication.abstract: To what extent can changes in PageRank's damping factor aect node ranking? We prove that, at least on some graphs, the top k nodes assume all possible k! orderings as the damping factor varies, even if it varies within an arbitrarily small interval (e.g. (0:84999 ; 0:85001)). Thus, the rank of a node for a given (nite set of discrete)

publication.title: psort, Yet Another Fast Stable Sorting Software
